comments.body: I wonder if it is worth keeping the OLDNEWS.txt? It has some historical interest, but other than that is isn't clear to me that it is usefull. Maybe it could be fixed up and added as `doc/release/old-f2py-releases.rst` or some such.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +2,6 @@.. topic:: Old F2PY NEWS

  January 30, 2005

    Latest F2PY release (version 2.45.241_1926).
